Headcrab

2 HP 6 STR, jump-attack (d6)

• Jumps up to 10 feet (3m).

• Hide in inconvenient places and/or inconvenient numbers to ambush unsuspecting targets

• CD: Attach to head and deal d10 STR damage per round, turns target into zombie at 0 STR

category: monsters source: discord
